title: ‘VACCINE PASSPORT’ PROPOSAL ANOTHER DISCRIMINATORY STANCE BY GOVERNMENTS
cleaned_text:
The President of the European Commission Ursula von der Leyen recently announced a “Digital Green Pass” for the EU citizens. This green pass will be issued to those who have received the vaccination – and excluding those who did not.

While it seems that the support for COVI9 vaccine passports is growing, the move is bound to create a great divide amongst people. Those who can access and afford the vaccine and those who can’t will supposedly lie on the ‘good’ and ‘not so good’ side of the governments.

Not to mention, besides the EU, China is the biggest supporter of Vaccine Passports. Motivated by its suppressive ‘communist philosophy,’ no wonder the probable proponent of COVID seeks to exert more control over the citizens.

Experts are of the opinion that the United States can formulate a similar certification system to tag those who have received the vaccine. However, discrimination, equality and fundamental rights will pose a great hurdle for them.

“It would be extraordinarily difficult in the U.S.,” Georgetown Law professor Lawrence O. Gostin stated in the context of the government’s attempt to adopt a certification system that aims to restrain the liberty of American citizens who cannot produce or possess proof of COVID-19 vaccination.

Experts think that such a move will lead to increasing claims of discrimination since the vaccination will be more accessible to the privileged class than others.

To protect the so-called public health, Governments usually have a lot of legislation power to enact and enforce laws like Vaccine passport. If they can mandate vaccination by violating your bodily rights, they can definitely enforce an identifying tag on your passport!

Cancer and Infertility Cases Projected to Go Up

We’ve reported before how untested vaccines are leading to fatal health conditions like breast cancer, heart failure and infertility amongst people. If such blatant negligence in administering vaccines and enforcing them on people continues, it wouldn’t be surprising if one in two people come to be diagnosed with cancer or cancer-like diseases.

While 20 years ago, such a number was considered to be a far-fetched idea, it is today a likely possibility.

However, there are still many natural ways to subvert the ill effects of the vaccine and its side-effects. For instance, one can take GcMAF therapy from an experienced medical practitioner. Moreover, healthy eating and the inclusion of Vitamin D3 and K2 in your diet can do wonders for your health!

You can read about easing the symptoms of cancer and other health conditions through power foods and other natural ways here.

We ask why?

65 years ago fund raising commenced for Cancer Research, with billions of dollars in donations every year they are still no closer to finding a “cure.” This is a huge FAIL however you look at it we see much the same options of the very same chemo, radiation and surgery, with little by way of a cure and ZERO by way of prevention.

Yet the billions of dollars continue to flood in and cancer research get a pat on the back for failing every year. Where is the vaccine that destroys cancer? Where is the vaccine that cures diabetes?

Both Cancer and diabetes individually have destroyed more lives than Covid. There has never been a cure for the common cold, so do you really believe that in just months that a “cure” has been found for COVID 19 and it comes in the form of vaccine? No research or longevity studies needed, yet the claims of “cure” and prevention are HUMUNGOUS but so is the propaganda, fear mongering and profiteering.

Will the cost be to your health or that of a loved one? the cost of this “”cure” looks like it will be people’s health and the vaccine in this case CAN NOT be reversed. Remember this or you or/and a loved one may pay dearly later…

Why do we have Quarantine when never in the history of infectious diseases have healthy people been subject to Quarantine?

The Vaccine only allows for its use in the case of an EMERGENCY

The Vaccine remains in Trials ONLY until 2023. If lockdown and Quarantine ends, this ends the emergency administration of the Vaccine. So as things stand now, you, your children and loved ones are the trial for the vaccine. This is the Only reason for quarantine and lockdown. Hence it is now an endemic, which means it will NEVER end!

Will you be taking the Vaccine?

Let’s look at the word Vaccine and break it down: Vac-Sins because we have headed into a Vac-Sin-Nation with our eyes wide open to the dangers!

Spread the world for a better, healthier world!

We do the research you decide, 

 Love and Light

 The Healing Oracle Team 

 Please join our growing numbers on MeWe: Healing Oracle 

 Also join us on YouTube



 Global Petition



 Please 

Vaccines are a global problem and need to be tackled on a global level. 

 If we stand as one, we have a chance of saving the children of the future.
